title: Foot & Ankle Pain Regenerative Programme
description: Platelet-rich plasma, adipose cell therapy, and targeted rehab that calm plantar fasciitis, ankle instability, and chronic tendon pain.
longDescription: From first-step stabbing pain to recurring sprains, our foot and ankle specialists combine diagnostic imaging, regenerative injections, and movement coaching to rebuild support from the ground up. We restore cushioning, reduce inflammation, and re-train biomechanics so walking, training, and long days on your feet feel effortless again.

overview.title: How the Programme Works
overview.content: Every patient receives ultrasound assessment to map fascia, tendons, and ligament integrity. We then tailor therapy using PRP, adipose cell concentrate, or percutaneous tenotomy. Rehab covers calf strength, intrinsic foot activation, and gait coaching so the relief lasts.
highlights: Treats plantar fasciitis, Achilles tendinopathy, ankle instability, and Morton’s neuroma
Physio support with custom orthotics and loading plans
